title: Bug Splat
body: Getting continues bug splats anytime i try to enter a game.  can go through champ select no problem but when launching game no dice this is happening in all types of games.  I submitted a report through bugsplat but is there anyway to track when and if this si fixed or how i can fix it.

replies.body:
I'm having the same problem. I think it has something to do with the latest Windows 10 update. It started after I did it. 

EDIT: Already reinstalled the game to no effect, hoped that today's patch would fix it, but it didn't too. Sent numerous bug splat reports last few days...

EDIT 2: Tried the Hextech Repair Tool, didn't work. Sent a ticket with the logs it created (Request #23521334).

Try disabling the Xbox DVR feature, see below:

 http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/NAXe6XfY-i-may-have-figured-out-the-crashing-problem-guys

OMG GG IT WORKED YOU ARE AWESOME HONOR THIS DUDE

I disabled the XBOX DVR and I used "Optimize" on Geforce Experience, not sure which one sealed the deal, but one of them did! 1000 thanks!

Having the same issue here, I've followed the game crash guide and used the Hextech tool but nothing has worked...

Please help!

EDIT: I turned off the DVR feature in the XBox app which is now enabled by defualt in the recent Windows 10 update from what I have read. It worked for me!!

Bugsplat errors upon entering a game can be caused by bad games files or drivers failing to render properly, and I'd like to help you get this fixed up.  Go over each step in our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to troubleshoot this, and use our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to automatically perform some of those steps.  This should do the trick, but let me know if you have any questions!
